Browse the source code of netbsd/sys/external/bsd/drm2/dist/drm/radeon/evergreen_reg.h

26#ifndef __EVERGREEN_REG_H__
27#define __EVERGREEN_REG_H__
28
29/* trinity */
30#define TN_SMC_IND_INDEX_0 0x200
31#define TN_SMC_IND_DATA_0 0x204
32
33/* evergreen */
34#define EVERGREEN_PIF_PHY0_INDEX 0x8
35#define EVERGREEN_PIF_PHY0_DATA 0xc
36#define EVERGREEN_PIF_PHY1_INDEX 0x10
37#define EVERGREEN_PIF_PHY1_DATA 0x14
38#define EVERGREEN_MM_INDEX_HI 0x18
39
40#define EVERGREEN_VGA_MEMORY_BASE_ADDRESS 0x310
41#define EVERGREEN_VGA_MEMORY_BASE_ADDRESS_HIGH 0x324
42#define EVERGREEN_D3VGA_CONTROL 0x3e0
43#define EVERGREEN_D4VGA_CONTROL 0x3e4
44#define EVERGREEN_D5VGA_CONTROL 0x3e8
45#define EVERGREEN_D6VGA_CONTROL 0x3ec
46
47#define EVERGREEN_P1PLL_SS_CNTL 0x414
48#define EVERGREEN_P2PLL_SS_CNTL 0x454
49# define EVERGREEN_PxPLL_SS_EN (1 << 12)
50
51#define EVERGREEN_AUDIO_PLL1_MUL 0x5b0
52#define EVERGREEN_AUDIO_PLL1_DIV 0x5b4
53#define EVERGREEN_AUDIO_PLL1_UNK 0x5bc
54
55#define EVERGREEN_CG_IND_ADDR 0x8f8
56#define EVERGREEN_CG_IND_DATA 0x8fc
57
58#define EVERGREEN_AUDIO_ENABLE 0x5e78
59#define EVERGREEN_AUDIO_VENDOR_ID 0x5ec0
60
61/* GRPH blocks at 0x6800, 0x7400, 0x10000, 0x10c00, 0x11800, 0x12400 */
62#define EVERGREEN_GRPH_ENABLE 0x6800
63#define EVERGREEN_GRPH_CONTROL 0x6804
64# define EVERGREEN_GRPH_DEPTH(x) (((x) & 0x3) << 0)
65# define EVERGREEN_GRPH_DEPTH_8BPP 0
66# define EVERGREEN_GRPH_DEPTH_16BPP 1
67# define EVERGREEN_GRPH_DEPTH_32BPP 2
68# define EVERGREEN_GRPH_NUM_BANKS(x) (((x) & 0x3) << 2)
69# define EVERGREEN_ADDR_SURF_2_BANK 0
70# define EVERGREEN_ADDR_SURF_4_BANK 1
71# define EVERGREEN_ADDR_SURF_8_BANK 2
72# define EVERGREEN_ADDR_SURF_16_BANK 3
73# define EVERGREEN_GRPH_Z(x) (((x) & 0x3) << 4)
74# define EVERGREEN_GRPH_BANK_WIDTH(x) (((x) & 0x3) << 6)
75# define EVERGREEN_ADDR_SURF_BANK_WIDTH_1 0
76# define EVERGREEN_ADDR_SURF_BANK_WIDTH_2 1
77# define EVERGREEN_ADDR_SURF_BANK_WIDTH_4 2
78# define EVERGREEN_ADDR_SURF_BANK_WIDTH_8 3
79# define EVERGREEN_GRPH_FORMAT(x) (((x) & 0x7) << 8)
80/* 8 BPP */
81# define EVERGREEN_GRPH_FORMAT_INDEXED 0
82/* 16 BPP */
83# define EVERGREEN_GRPH_FORMAT_ARGB1555 0
84# define EVERGREEN_GRPH_FORMAT_ARGB565 1
85# define EVERGREEN_GRPH_FORMAT_ARGB4444 2
86# define EVERGREEN_GRPH_FORMAT_AI88 3
87# define EVERGREEN_GRPH_FORMAT_MONO16 4
88# define EVERGREEN_GRPH_FORMAT_BGRA5551 5
89/* 32 BPP */
90# define EVERGREEN_GRPH_FORMAT_ARGB8888 0
91# define EVERGREEN_GRPH_FORMAT_ARGB2101010 1
92# define EVERGREEN_GRPH_FORMAT_32BPP_DIG 2
93# define EVERGREEN_GRPH_FORMAT_8B_ARGB2101010 3
94# define EVERGREEN_GRPH_FORMAT_BGRA1010102 4
95# define EVERGREEN_GRPH_FORMAT_8B_BGRA1010102 5
96# define EVERGREEN_GRPH_FORMAT_RGB111110 6
97# define EVERGREEN_GRPH_FORMAT_BGR101111 7
98# define EVERGREEN_GRPH_BANK_HEIGHT(x) (((x) & 0x3) << 11)
99# define EVERGREEN_ADDR_SURF_BANK_HEIGHT_1 0
100# define EVERGREEN_ADDR_SURF_BANK_HEIGHT_2 1
101# define EVERGREEN_ADDR_SURF_BANK_HEIGHT_4 2
102# define EVERGREEN_ADDR_SURF_BANK_HEIGHT_8 3
103# define EVERGREEN_GRPH_TILE_SPLIT(x) (((x) & 0x7) << 13)
104# define EVERGREEN_ADDR_SURF_TILE_SPLIT_64B 0
105# define EVERGREEN_ADDR_SURF_TILE_SPLIT_128B 1
106# define EVERGREEN_ADDR_SURF_TILE_SPLIT_256B 2
107# define EVERGREEN_ADDR_SURF_TILE_SPLIT_512B 3
108# define EVERGREEN_ADDR_SURF_TILE_SPLIT_1KB 4
109# define EVERGREEN_ADDR_SURF_TILE_SPLIT_2KB 5
110# define EVERGREEN_ADDR_SURF_TILE_SPLIT_4KB 6
111# define EVERGREEN_GRPH_MACRO_TILE_ASPECT(x) (((x) & 0x3) << 18)
112# define EVERGREEN_ADDR_SURF_MACRO_TILE_ASPECT_1 0
113# define EVERGREEN_ADDR_SURF_MACRO_TILE_ASPECT_2 1
114# define EVERGREEN_ADDR_SURF_MACRO_TILE_ASPECT_4 2
115# define EVERGREEN_ADDR_SURF_MACRO_TILE_ASPECT_8 3
116# define EVERGREEN_GRPH_ARRAY_MODE(x) (((x) & 0x7) << 20)
117# define EVERGREEN_GRPH_ARRAY_LINEAR_GENERAL 0
118# define EVERGREEN_GRPH_ARRAY_LINEAR_ALIGNED 1
119# define EVERGREEN_GRPH_ARRAY_1D_TILED_THIN1 2
120# define EVERGREEN_GRPH_ARRAY_2D_TILED_THIN1 4
121#define EVERGREEN_GRPH_LUT_10BIT_BYPASS_CONTROL 0x6808
122# define EVERGREEN_LUT_10BIT_BYPASS_EN (1 << 8)
123#define EVERGREEN_GRPH_SWAP_CONTROL 0x680c
124# define EVERGREEN_GRPH_ENDIAN_SWAP(x) (((x) & 0x3) << 0)
125# define EVERGREEN_GRPH_ENDIAN_NONE 0
126# define EVERGREEN_GRPH_ENDIAN_8IN16 1
127# define EVERGREEN_GRPH_ENDIAN_8IN32 2
128# define EVERGREEN_GRPH_ENDIAN_8IN64 3
129# define EVERGREEN_GRPH_RED_CROSSBAR(x) (((x) & 0x3) << 4)
130# define EVERGREEN_GRPH_RED_SEL_R 0
131# define EVERGREEN_GRPH_RED_SEL_G 1
132# define EVERGREEN_GRPH_RED_SEL_B 2
133# define EVERGREEN_GRPH_RED_SEL_A 3
134# define EVERGREEN_GRPH_GREEN_CROSSBAR(x) (((x) & 0x3) << 6)
135# define EVERGREEN_GRPH_GREEN_SEL_G 0
136# define EVERGREEN_GRPH_GREEN_SEL_B 1
137# define EVERGREEN_GRPH_GREEN_SEL_A 2
138# define EVERGREEN_GRPH_GREEN_SEL_R 3
139# define EVERGREEN_GRPH_BLUE_CROSSBAR(x) (((x) & 0x3) << 8)
140# define EVERGREEN_GRPH_BLUE_SEL_B 0
141# define EVERGREEN_GRPH_BLUE_SEL_A 1
142# define EVERGREEN_GRPH_BLUE_SEL_R 2
143# define EVERGREEN_GRPH_BLUE_SEL_G 3
144# define EVERGREEN_GRPH_ALPHA_CROSSBAR(x) (((x) & 0x3) << 10)
145# define EVERGREEN_GRPH_ALPHA_SEL_A 0
146# define EVERGREEN_GRPH_ALPHA_SEL_R 1
147# define EVERGREEN_GRPH_ALPHA_SEL_G 2
148# define EVERGREEN_GRPH_ALPHA_SEL_B 3
149#define EVERGREEN_GRPH_PRIMARY_SURFACE_ADDRESS 0x6810
150#define EVERGREEN_GRPH_SECONDARY_SURFACE_ADDRESS 0x6814
151# define EVERGREEN_GRPH_DFQ_ENABLE (1 << 0)
152# define EVERGREEN_GRPH_SURFACE_ADDRESS_MASK 0xffffff00
153#define EVERGREEN_GRPH_PITCH 0x6818
154#define EVERGREEN_GRPH_PRIMARY_SURFACE_ADDRESS_HIGH 0x681c
155#define EVERGREEN_GRPH_SECONDARY_SURFACE_ADDRESS_HIGH 0x6820
156#define EVERGREEN_GRPH_SURFACE_OFFSET_X 0x6824
157#define EVERGREEN_GRPH_SURFACE_OFFSET_Y 0x6828
158#define EVERGREEN_GRPH_X_START 0x682c
159#define EVERGREEN_GRPH_Y_START 0x6830
160#define EVERGREEN_GRPH_X_END 0x6834
161#define EVERGREEN_GRPH_Y_END 0x6838
162#define EVERGREEN_GRPH_UPDATE 0x6844
163# define EVERGREEN_GRPH_SURFACE_UPDATE_PENDING (1 << 2)
164# define EVERGREEN_GRPH_UPDATE_LOCK (1 << 16)
165#define EVERGREEN_GRPH_FLIP_CONTROL 0x6848
166# define EVERGREEN_GRPH_SURFACE_UPDATE_H_RETRACE_EN (1 << 0)
167
168/* CUR blocks at 0x6998, 0x7598, 0x10198, 0x10d98, 0x11998, 0x12598 */
169#define EVERGREEN_CUR_CONTROL 0x6998
170# define EVERGREEN_CURSOR_EN (1 << 0)
171# define EVERGREEN_CURSOR_MODE(x) (((x) & 0x3) << 8)
172# define EVERGREEN_CURSOR_MONO 0
173# define EVERGREEN_CURSOR_24_1 1
174# define EVERGREEN_CURSOR_24_8_PRE_MULT 2
175# define EVERGREEN_CURSOR_24_8_UNPRE_MULT 3
176# define EVERGREEN_CURSOR_2X_MAGNIFY (1 << 16)
177# define EVERGREEN_CURSOR_FORCE_MC_ON (1 << 20)
178# define EVERGREEN_CURSOR_URGENT_CONTROL(x) (((x) & 0x7) << 24)
179# define EVERGREEN_CURSOR_URGENT_ALWAYS 0
180# define EVERGREEN_CURSOR_URGENT_1_8 1
181# define EVERGREEN_CURSOR_URGENT_1_4 2
182# define EVERGREEN_CURSOR_URGENT_3_8 3
183# define EVERGREEN_CURSOR_URGENT_1_2 4
184#define EVERGREEN_CUR_SURFACE_ADDRESS 0x699c
185# define EVERGREEN_CUR_SURFACE_ADDRESS_MASK 0xfffff000
186#define EVERGREEN_CUR_SIZE 0x69a0
187#define EVERGREEN_CUR_SURFACE_ADDRESS_HIGH 0x69a4
188#define EVERGREEN_CUR_POSITION 0x69a8
189#define EVERGREEN_CUR_HOT_SPOT 0x69ac
190#define EVERGREEN_CUR_COLOR1 0x69b0
191#define EVERGREEN_CUR_COLOR2 0x69b4
192#define EVERGREEN_CUR_UPDATE 0x69b8
193# define EVERGREEN_CURSOR_UPDATE_PENDING (1 << 0)
194# define EVERGREEN_CURSOR_UPDATE_TAKEN (1 << 1)
195# define EVERGREEN_CURSOR_UPDATE_LOCK (1 << 16)
196# define EVERGREEN_CURSOR_DISABLE_MULTIPLE_UPDATE (1 << 24)
197
198/* LUT blocks at 0x69e0, 0x75e0, 0x101e0, 0x10de0, 0x119e0, 0x125e0 */
199#define EVERGREEN_DC_LUT_RW_MODE 0x69e0
200#define EVERGREEN_DC_LUT_RW_INDEX 0x69e4
201#define EVERGREEN_DC_LUT_SEQ_COLOR 0x69e8
202#define EVERGREEN_DC_LUT_PWL_DATA 0x69ec
203#define EVERGREEN_DC_LUT_30_COLOR 0x69f0
204#define EVERGREEN_DC_LUT_VGA_ACCESS_ENABLE 0x69f4
205#define EVERGREEN_DC_LUT_WRITE_EN_MASK 0x69f8
206#define EVERGREEN_DC_LUT_AUTOFILL 0x69fc
207#define EVERGREEN_DC_LUT_CONTROL 0x6a00
208#define EVERGREEN_DC_LUT_BLACK_OFFSET_BLUE 0x6a04
209#define EVERGREEN_DC_LUT_BLACK_OFFSET_GREEN 0x6a08
210#define EVERGREEN_DC_LUT_BLACK_OFFSET_RED 0x6a0c
211#define EVERGREEN_DC_LUT_WHITE_OFFSET_BLUE 0x6a10
212#define EVERGREEN_DC_LUT_WHITE_OFFSET_GREEN 0x6a14
213#define EVERGREEN_DC_LUT_WHITE_OFFSET_RED 0x6a18
214
215#define EVERGREEN_DATA_FORMAT 0x6b00
216# define EVERGREEN_INTERLEAVE_EN (1 << 0)
217#define EVERGREEN_DESKTOP_HEIGHT 0x6b04
218#define EVERGREEN_VLINE_START_END 0x6b08
219#define EVERGREEN_VLINE_STATUS 0x6bb8
220# define EVERGREEN_VLINE_STAT (1 << 12)
221
222#define EVERGREEN_VIEWPORT_START 0x6d70
223#define EVERGREEN_VIEWPORT_SIZE 0x6d74
224
225/* display controller offsets used for crtc/cur/lut/grph/viewport/etc. */
226#define EVERGREEN_CRTC0_REGISTER_OFFSET (0x6df0 - 0x6df0)
227#define EVERGREEN_CRTC1_REGISTER_OFFSET (0x79f0 - 0x6df0)
228#define EVERGREEN_CRTC2_REGISTER_OFFSET (0x105f0 - 0x6df0)
229#define EVERGREEN_CRTC3_REGISTER_OFFSET (0x111f0 - 0x6df0)
230#define EVERGREEN_CRTC4_REGISTER_OFFSET (0x11df0 - 0x6df0)
231#define EVERGREEN_CRTC5_REGISTER_OFFSET (0x129f0 - 0x6df0)
232
233/* CRTC blocks at 0x6df0, 0x79f0, 0x105f0, 0x111f0, 0x11df0, 0x129f0 */
234#define EVERGREEN_CRTC_V_BLANK_START_END 0x6e34
235#define EVERGREEN_CRTC_CONTROL 0x6e70
236# define EVERGREEN_CRTC_MASTER_EN (1 << 0)
237# define EVERGREEN_CRTC_DISP_READ_REQUEST_DISABLE (1 << 24)
238#define EVERGREEN_CRTC_BLANK_CONTROL 0x6e74
239# define EVERGREEN_CRTC_BLANK_DATA_EN (1 << 8)
240#define EVERGREEN_CRTC_STATUS 0x6e8c
241# define EVERGREEN_CRTC_V_BLANK (1 << 0)
242#define EVERGREEN_CRTC_STATUS_POSITION 0x6e90
243#define EVERGREEN_CRTC_STATUS_HV_COUNT 0x6ea0
244#define EVERGREEN_CRTC_UPDATE_LOCK 0x6ed4
245#define EVERGREEN_MASTER_UPDATE_LOCK 0x6ef4
246#define EVERGREEN_MASTER_UPDATE_MODE 0x6ef8
247
248#define EVERGREEN_DC_GPIO_HPD_MASK 0x64b0
249#define EVERGREEN_DC_GPIO_HPD_A 0x64b4
250#define EVERGREEN_DC_GPIO_HPD_EN 0x64b8
251#define EVERGREEN_DC_GPIO_HPD_Y 0x64bc
252
253/* HDMI blocks at 0x7030, 0x7c30, 0x10830, 0x11430, 0x12030, 0x12c30 */
254#define EVERGREEN_HDMI_BASE 0x7030
255/*DIG block*/
256#define NI_DIG0_REGISTER_OFFSET (0x7000 - 0x7000)
257#define NI_DIG1_REGISTER_OFFSET (0x7C00 - 0x7000)
258#define NI_DIG2_REGISTER_OFFSET (0x10800 - 0x7000)
259#define NI_DIG3_REGISTER_OFFSET (0x11400 - 0x7000)
260#define NI_DIG4_REGISTER_OFFSET (0x12000 - 0x7000)
261#define NI_DIG5_REGISTER_OFFSET (0x12C00 - 0x7000)
262
263
264#define NI_DIG_FE_CNTL 0x7000
265# define NI_DIG_FE_CNTL_SOURCE_SELECT(x) ((x) & 0x3)
266# define NI_DIG_FE_CNTL_SYMCLK_FE_ON (1<<24)
267
268
269#define NI_DIG_BE_CNTL 0x7140
270# define NI_DIG_BE_CNTL_FE_SOURCE_SELECT(x) (((x) >> 8 ) & 0x3F)
271# define NI_DIG_FE_CNTL_MODE(x) (((x) >> 16) & 0x7 )
272
273#define NI_DIG_BE_EN_CNTL 0x7144
274# define NI_DIG_BE_EN_CNTL_ENABLE (1 << 0)
275# define NI_DIG_BE_EN_CNTL_SYMBCLK_ON (1 << 8)
276# define NI_DIG_BE_DPSST 0
277
278/* Display Port block */
279#define EVERGREEN_DP0_REGISTER_OFFSET (0x730C - 0x730C)
280#define EVERGREEN_DP1_REGISTER_OFFSET (0x7F0C - 0x730C)
281#define EVERGREEN_DP2_REGISTER_OFFSET (0x10B0C - 0x730C)
282#define EVERGREEN_DP3_REGISTER_OFFSET (0x1170C - 0x730C)
283#define EVERGREEN_DP4_REGISTER_OFFSET (0x1230C - 0x730C)
284#define EVERGREEN_DP5_REGISTER_OFFSET (0x12F0C - 0x730C)
285
286
287#define EVERGREEN_DP_VID_STREAM_CNTL 0x730C
288# define EVERGREEN_DP_VID_STREAM_CNTL_ENABLE (1 << 0)
289# define EVERGREEN_DP_VID_STREAM_STATUS (1 <<16)
290#define EVERGREEN_DP_STEER_FIFO 0x7310
291# define EVERGREEN_DP_STEER_FIFO_RESET (1 << 0)
292#define EVERGREEN_DP_SEC_CNTL 0x7280
293# define EVERGREEN_DP_SEC_STREAM_ENABLE (1 << 0)
294# define EVERGREEN_DP_SEC_ASP_ENABLE (1 << 4)
295# define EVERGREEN_DP_SEC_ATP_ENABLE (1 << 8)
296# define EVERGREEN_DP_SEC_AIP_ENABLE (1 << 12)
297# define EVERGREEN_DP_SEC_GSP_ENABLE (1 << 20)
298# define EVERGREEN_DP_SEC_AVI_ENABLE (1 << 24)
299# define EVERGREEN_DP_SEC_MPG_ENABLE (1 << 28)
300#define EVERGREEN_DP_SEC_TIMESTAMP 0x72a4
301# define EVERGREEN_DP_SEC_TIMESTAMP_MODE(x) (((x) & 0x3) << 0)
302#define EVERGREEN_DP_SEC_AUD_N 0x7294
303# define EVERGREEN_DP_SEC_N_BASE_MULTIPLE(x) (((x) & 0xf) << 24)
304# define EVERGREEN_DP_SEC_SS_EN (1 << 28)
305
306/*DCIO_UNIPHY block*/
307#define NI_DCIO_UNIPHY0_UNIPHY_TX_CONTROL1 (0x6600 -0x6600)
308#define NI_DCIO_UNIPHY1_UNIPHY_TX_CONTROL1 (0x6640 -0x6600)
309#define NI_DCIO_UNIPHY2_UNIPHY_TX_CONTROL1 (0x6680 - 0x6600)
310#define NI_DCIO_UNIPHY3_UNIPHY_TX_CONTROL1 (0x66C0 - 0x6600)
311#define NI_DCIO_UNIPHY4_UNIPHY_TX_CONTROL1 (0x6700 - 0x6600)
312#define NI_DCIO_UNIPHY5_UNIPHY_TX_CONTROL1 (0x6740 - 0x6600)
313
314#define NI_DCIO_UNIPHY0_PLL_CONTROL1 0x6618
315# define NI_DCIO_UNIPHY0_PLL_CONTROL1_ENABLE (1 << 0)
316
317#endif
